name: Mind Stone
text: Mind Stone enters play with 8 quest counters on it. Hero Action: Spend X [mental] resources → remove X quest counters from here. While Mind Stone has no quest counters on it, you gain + 3 THW and your basic thwart ignores [crisis] icon and patrol keyword.

name: Reality Stone
text: Reality Stone enters play with 8 quest counters on it. Hero Action: Discard a card you control → remove X quest counters from here. Where X is the cost of the discarded card. While Reality Stone has no quest counters on it, your identity gets +2 hand size.

name: Soul Stone
text: Soul Stone enters play with 8 quest counters on it. Hero Action: Spend X [wild] resources → remove X quest counters from here. While Soul Stone has no quest counters on it, you gain the [[psionic ]]trait and your attacks gain drain 2.

name: Space Stone
text: Space Stone enters play with 8 quest counters on it. Hero Action: Spend X resources of any type → remove X quest counters from here. While Space Stone has no quest counters on it, increase your ally limit by 2 and reduce the cost of each ally you play by 2.

name: Time Stone
text: Time Stone enters play with 8 quest counters on it. Hero Action: Spend X [energy] resources → remove X quest counters from here. While Time Stone has no quest counters on it, you gain + 3 DEF and retaliate 1.

name: Power Stone
text: Mind Stone enters play with 8 quest counters on it. Hero Action: Spend X [physical] resources → remove X quest counters from here. While Mind Stone has no quest counters on it, you gain + 3 ATK and your basic attacks gain overkill.
